website_summaries.verdict: A unique coat rack that is an eye catcher on any wall. Doubles as functional art for large and small homes alike.
pros: Discrete folded hooks are out of the way when not in use
Clears up room for a couple of coats or other items
Hook spacing is perfect for larger coats
cons: Folded hooks can be hard to find when in the upright position

customer_reviews.title: Good enough for a B-
customer_reviews.text: Looks nice. Poor design because mounting holes aren’t 16” apart, which forces mounting to wall using at least one wall anchor, which for a product that is going to be constantly pulled on and used, I don’t trust as much as mounting into a wooden stud. Also, you cannot make your own mounting holes 16” apart due to the spacing of the usable pegs. Works as advertised. Reasonably priced.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle Steadmoore Kellerson III

customer_reviews.title: Looks Great!
customer_reviews.text: First off I never write reviews for anything but as I use them to decide if I should buy something or not I decided it's times to give back. I love these hooks! They feel very sturdy and i think they will hold up for awhile. They look very contemporary and I feel much more organized with my hats up here than leaving them in my closet!
customer_reviews.author: rebecca a sand

customer_reviews.title: Good, but smaller than I expected
customer_reviews.text: It’s very nice product. Very interesting design idea. However it looks muck bigger on Amazon images. So once I installed in on the wall I feel like I need another one to make it longer. The installation was easy and everything is included in the set like screws etc Durability? My winter coat is heavy and I am not risking to put it on. Buy my wife’s coat is light and my son’s clothes too. I can use it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Holds it weight!
customer_reviews.text: I lost the instructions which might have had a placement diagram. If it doesn’t it needs one but luckily I’m use to putting things up without one. I’m not sure if the screws are a little loose I don’t think so, but this thing wiggles just a little when you first put a coat on it. But it does definitely hold its weight! We are a family of 4 and everyone’s coat hangs perfectly it also looks really nice with my black tree decor in my living room! Definitely happy!
customer_reviews.author: Elbuort

customer_reviews.title: Love the design, not sure about long-term durability but for now I love it.
customer_reviews.text: My replacement came in perfect condition after the first one was damaged. Very sleek design. Instructions are a little lacking - drywall plugs that it comes with use a 1/4" drill bit. Make sure you measure the distance between the screw holes on the back and mark/level your holes based on that measurement - you won't get it level using the sticks. Also, the black will rub off a little on light walls if it makes contact during install so be mindful of that. We'll see how long it holds up!
customer_reviews.author: sininspira

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love these! They are modern, stylish, and functional! I especially love that they can be hooks when needed, or an art piece when they aren’t needed. They seem to hold a lot and they are sturdy. My only problem is that the paper that comes with them for installation might as well just have been a piece of paper... I had to do a lot of measuring to make sure I was putting the screws in the right place. Nonetheless, it worked out for the best!
customer_reviews.author: Sami Maskill

customer_reviews.title: In love with this
customer_reviews.text: I love these! I've been contemplating on what to do for coat rack since I dont have a hallway entry or mud room and then came across this piece of art. Its stunning and useful. I got two - one under another- so that when we dont hang coats on it it actually looks like a piece of art. Very sturdy as we hang many many coats thick and long and heavy on it ..definitely recommend
customer_reviews.author: almina

customer_reviews.title: It's plastic, not wood, and it looks like it.
customer_reviews.text: I really like the look... from a distance. The ads are not to scale, as it's smaller than it appears, but the dimensions are listed so you can verify this yourself. However, the description says it's made of wood, which makes you think the whole thing is wood. It's not. Inside, it's a cheap paperboard frame that's hollow in the middle. Outside, the actual hooky thing is cheap flimsy plastic. Overall, I'll still keep it and use it until I get around to shopping for new decor again. It does look nice until you get up close to it and see that it looks like a kid's plastic toy. See attached photos.
customer_reviews.author: Leeloo

customer_reviews.title: Modern looking replacement
customer_reviews.text: Needed a unique replacement that would cover some existing holes. This did the job. Note this is plastic but modem looking. As with anything that mounts with " hidden" screws you have to get the spacing just right. I ended up buying two if these and they look great. They seem pretty sturdy but you might want to be careful if this is being used by kids who might over fill it (too much weight)
customer_reviews.author: Bradley C. Neideck

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install, modern, sliiiiiiiiick.
customer_reviews.text: The hooks offered by your local box stores are SO boring. The wife and I loved this one so much, after installation, we immediately bought another one to extend the other half of the wall. Do note the manual says each hook has a max capacity of 5lbs.
customer_reviews.author: Spicyeggroll69

customer_reviews.title: Looks great, works great
customer_reviews.text: Looks just as good as the photos here on Amazon and feels sturdy, though I think both of these areas could be improved if it were constructed from wood instead of plastic. I'm very pleased with the purchase and it's a great addition to the entrance of my house.
customer_reviews.author: Applejack

customer_reviews.title: Cool contemporary look
customer_reviews.text: This rack is so cool and modern looking. It’s got plenty a room for a number of coats or hats as you can see. Funny enough we also use ours to hang our masks for the whole Covid situation ha ha. But this rack is awesome I highly recommend it it’s a great piece.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Works well on a door
customer_reviews.text: Holds 4 heavy winter and leather coats without issue. I’m using this on the back of an interior door and it works well. Installing would be a pain if you actually needed to use the mollys provided. Nobody likes pulling those out of drywall.
customer_reviews.author: RWJ

customer_reviews.title: Deck the halls with these racks!
customer_reviews.text: Got this wall-mount rack with hooks to maximize space in our bedroom while providing an elegant way to reserve my clothes for re-wearing rather than laundering. My wife is happy as no more jeans, T-shirts, or shorts on the floor. If not in use this rack sleekly closes into an interesting work of art. While not the most quality of ingredients, it does seem sturdy and good quality for the price. The hooks lower smoothly and stay in place when pushed in line with the rack (unlike another reviewer complained about so maybe that was a defective rack). Rack came with easy-to-understand instructions and was installed quickly and without much hassle. Very pleased with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Beau Mots

customer_reviews.title: This looks great in our entryway
customer_reviews.text: This looks great in our entryway; not only can we hang coats on it, but all of the dog walking things (harness, leash, etc...) can hang on one peg and reduces clutter. It will also look very nice in the summer when it's not loaded down with coats :) It was easy to mount and seems very stable. I would recommend mounting with your own hardware, as the mounting screws and drywall anchors are not the most formidable.
customer_reviews.author: Gildagor

customer_reviews.title: Cool and functional
customer_reviews.text: I put 2 next to each other to better fill the space on my wall. They look great and seem pretty sturdy, haven't held much weight yet but tugging on it, they feel solid. If you're looking for something that's interesting looking and functional, this is a great option.
customer_reviews.author: Angie

customer_reviews.title: Looks great
customer_reviews.text: I love this! It’s a really stylish coat hanger and I have it right by the door. I had a little trouble installing it but i think that’s on me — I did something incorrectly with the anchors (it comes with those little plastic ones) and ended up using larger ones to make it work.
customer_reviews.author: Mari

customer_reviews.title: Functional and Fun
customer_reviews.text: The hooks are functional and fun. There are 5 hooks for hanging your items. It's plastic, not wood - though the description does state this. Easy to install, came with a paper ruler to use as a guide when installing. I have rain coats, umbrellas, sweaters, and dog leashes hanging on it and it's holding well.
customer_reviews.author: M String

customer_reviews.title: Pretty, but Lacking Clear Install Instructions
customer_reviews.text: They seem to look good and work well so far but instructions for install are vague and not good for a novice. No recommendations on drill bit size or spacing. Comes with a paper ruler that is not very useful. I can see that others may have difficulty with hanging these. Despite that, I do like the product overall- we purchased (2) for our toddler to hang her jackets in winter. It is great that it folds flat when not in use.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Nice, subtle coat rack
customer_reviews.text: It doesn’t seem the pegs can hold a ton of weight, but it didn’t seem like any of the things I put on it would cause breakage so I’m not really concerned. I like the look of it and it seems secure to the wall. I did use my own screws/anchors per other reviews. I don’t have a coat closet by my front door and living in the Midwest, I didn’t want to walk through my house with a wet jacket and have an easy spot for guests to put their coats. Fits perfectly behind my door.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea

customer_reviews.title: Looks great!!
customer_reviews.text: This was very easy to install. I love that it came with a paper ruler! I get so many compliments on this. I use it as a coat hook. Very clever and very classy looking! if I ever need more hugs for my house I will definitely purchase again!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Love this!
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these to use in my laundry area to hang delicates to dry. I hung them side by side on the wall so they look like a bit of modern "art" when I'm not using them. I hung them by myself (59yr old woman) without any issues but I didn't use the instructions. I just measured and hung them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: When not in use, it looks like art
customer_reviews.text: I use it to hang my aprons on when I'm not baking or cooking. Space is at a premium and I didn't want ugly hooks sticking out of the wall. When I saw this, which looks like a nifty piece of art, I knew it was an instant match for my kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Phoenix is Rising

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and Effective
customer_reviews.text: Takes very little space on the wall, and is very sturdy. Now I've used this for more than a year. It is very sturdy as we have put many winter coats on it and we have faced 0 issues.
customer_reviews.author: Rishabh Ganjoo

customer_reviews.title: Poor design! Edges too Sharp!
customer_reviews.text: The hooks are made of wood that has very sharp edges. Hang your coats or bags on these enough and they'll end up torn. I love great design but with this one, it's definitely all about form over function and it's just not worth it! They missed the mark on this. I'm sorry but there's a reason those basic metal hooks work!
customer_reviews.author: Hila S.

customer_reviews.title: All Plastic and wrong dimensions in ad
customer_reviews.text: There is no wood in this product, it is all plastic. The dimensions are also not correct. I purchased this because the specs say it's 18" long, and I have an 18.25" wall space to mount it. It's 19.25" long. Unbelievable. The ad is dishonest about the materials and they can't operate a tape measure. This item is getting returned.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love that it can be folded up as "art" when ...
customer_reviews.text: I had read the reviews ahead of time so I knew what I was getting. It does have a hollow plastic feel, but it has held lots of coats without fail. Love that it can be folded up as "art" when not in use. Be aware though...I had done all the measuring to hang it and had used the little enclosed template for mounting the screws. However, after it was installed I realized that the hanging holes on the rack were not centered as I had assumed. So my rack is not centered in the space I had designated for it. Annoyed with that, but pleased with the rack itself.
customer_reviews.author: Misty Bindl

customer_reviews.title: Too light weight.
customer_reviews.text: I think it should be molded out of one solid piece. The back is not flat and has a rim all the way around. I think the design could be improved.
customer_reviews.author: MIke S

customer_reviews.title: Great product. Great Price.
customer_reviews.text: 2nd set of these. 1st set we hung a bag with too much stuff in it and the piece broke off of it. Now we are ordering another one. Be conscious of the weight you place on these. Works and Looks great otherwise!
customer_reviews.author: RealDeal

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic purchase!!
customer_reviews.text: We got it for our kids to hang their backpacks on. We weren’t certain it would be sturdy enough, but at this price it was worth the try. We hung it below our coat hooks so the design was perfect since it lays flat when not in use. It works great for their bags and looks good when not in use!! Love it!!
customer_reviews.author: Amy Simmons

customer_reviews.title: as described
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the brown and it is exactly as described. It does have a slightly plastic look and I would rather have it in solid wood but for the cost it is great. I love the fact that it looks like art and serves as a coat rack. Its a great concept. I would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: This is pretty unique I’ve never bought anything like it and i love it! You can fold the little hooks back in when you aren’t using them, it’s a cute towel holder !
customer_reviews.author: Carly

customer_reviews.title: not bad
customer_reviews.text: Kinda cool looking - different, that's for sure. However what ticked us off was the hooks on the back were too close together -- if you're going to hang coats on this, it needs to be able to handle a little weight so it's best if you can hang it where the studs are. The "standard" building code is that studs are 16" apart (on center) and while this item is wide enough to have the hooks 16" apart -- they put them closer together. And THAT made me mark this down. Also, it's kind of more like a plastic than wood.... but like I said - it's kind of cool looking.
customer_reviews.author: N. Gregg

customer_reviews.title: Item not as expected. The price is high for this product.
customer_reviews.text: I would like to return it. It's too expensive for the type and quality of it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love the look of these
customer_reviews.text: Hung these up over the weekend and I love them. I actually bought two that i staggered on our wall, one for hats and the other for coats. It looks SO much better than just the plain old hooks we had before and the wall we put them on is a dark gray so these really popped. The packaging they came in was good and installation was very easy. I would suggest buying your own anchors if you need them because the ones provided are a little cheap.
customer_reviews.author: Rose L

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love love love. I was a little nervous based on some reviews but I’m glad I didn't listen this tome. I love this coat rack. It’s unique and perfect for my decor.
customer_reviews.author: Eriekab

customer_reviews.title: Looks awesome
customer_reviews.text: I gave this item fours stars. I was shopping for a coat hook that was efficient for winter yet stylish for summer when it isn't being used and this item met those needs. It is sturdy and looks very nice. While I am very pleased with my purchase, I would like to note that although it looks like wood, it is primarily made of plastic. It was packaged neatly and safely in a plain Amazon box and arrived very quickly. I'm very pleased with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: MichelleS.

customer_reviews.title: I Love this Rack
customer_reviews.text: This is super cute, works really well as a towel rack in the bathroom. There are lots of hanging spaces for small spaces.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany A.

customer_reviews.title: Love this coat rack so cute and perfectly fitting for the space
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a coat rack that was different and came across this one. I absolutely love it! Works perfect in the spot we need it. I wasn't expecting to put the diaper bag, sons books bag, and his coats on it. It works as the entry way when you come in from the garage and perfect for what we need it for!
customer_reviews.author: Mary Inc

customer_reviews.title: Decor meets usefulness
customer_reviews.text: I love it. I place my purse and my bf’s backpack on it and two of our sweaters so it’s pretty sturdy. If you don’t Install it correctly, you’ll probably say that its the products fault but no, it’s your own. It feels less than durable but so far ive had it for two weeks and its been holding up nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Nadine Pierre-Louis

customer_reviews.title: I wish I would’ve bought it sooner
customer_reviews.text: It’s SO cool looking. I thought I wouldn’t like my coats being out on display, but it’s a cool, funky touch in my living room. I found sturdier than some other reviews state. I wouldn’t put 50 coats on it, but it’ll definitely hold all of our heavy winter coats.
customer_reviews.author: Amazonian Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Love it won't hold keys unless they are on a carabiner great for everything else
customer_reviews.author: C. Cronin

customer_reviews.title: Nice but delicate
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for an out of the norm wall hook and I found it! The design is great and it functions well, however, note that the maximum for each hook is 5 pounds. The hooks feel very flimsy and I'm sure if you go over the 5 pound limit your break them off.
customer_reviews.author: F. Danna

customer_reviews.title: works good looks good
customer_reviews.text: My wife was looking at this so we got one....then another. I was able to install them right next to each other so it looks like one long one. They are sturdy enough to hang heavy coats or back packs on and if you're not using one of the hooks you can essentially hide it by not pulling it out.
customer_reviews.author: JTS

customer_reviews.title: Simple to install!
customer_reviews.text: I installed these on the back of two bedroom doors in my house. I started by drilling a 1/16" pilot hole then used the provided screws and hung the rack from there. I did find that the template provided in the box was a little smaller than the actual product, by about 1/4", so I would suggest that anyone using the template check to make sure that the holes in the template line up with the actual product. Aside from that, it was super easy to install. Each rack took less than 5 minutes to install and they look great!
customer_reviews.author: M. Scozzari

customer_reviews.title: Best door wall mount hooks on Amazon
customer_reviews.text: I loved the look of these so much that I got two of these. For people who are big on aesthetics, these are great because when you aren't using this, they look like artwork. You just put the hooks back up. It's quite unique for wall hooks. However what other people said is true, the screws they provide are low quality. Should probably consider getting better quality screws. If you pre-drill though, it won't be an issue. Even bad quality screws will be fine if you pre-drill a hole which is why I overlooked this and decided on a 5 star review.
customer_reviews.author: Jon L.

customer_reviews.title: Works well, looks great
customer_reviews.text: Love this!! It looks cool when the hooks are flush and holds our leather Harley jackets with no problem. It comes with a hanging guide so it’s super easy to install.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great coat hook
customer_reviews.text: As silly as it is, people love this thing. I have many kids and even with a massive closet and a coat tree, I found coats laying everywhere. I bought this as it looked like a piece of art when not in use and declared it for my wife and I only. The rules have entirely been ignored.
customer_reviews.author: TK

customer_reviews.title: Stylish and modern hanger
customer_reviews.text: I love the color and that it’s made well. It is not too heavy. I would not hand heavy coats on it, but for my purse hanging needs it’s perfect. It was easy to install. Needed a drill and a skrewdriver and a level.
customer_reviews.author: Kile

customer_reviews.title: Not sure if I like it
customer_reviews.text: 50/50 on wether I should keep it or not, its a little thicker and bigger than I expected.
customer_reviews.author: Omar Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Liked it so much I bought a 2nd
customer_reviews.text: I bought one of these, and I loved it so much that I bought a second one. With two of them, I now have space to hang 10 items, and it looks like one long piece instead of two.
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Cute and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I bought this hanger because I found it cute, and is very sturdy too, we have 5 coats on it, a few heavy ones, and is holding it up.
customer_reviews.author: Bibi Anna

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I have 2 of these mounted in my closet. Robes, wet towels, sweatshirts, belts, hats. These are very sturdy as compared to the other umbra wall mounts I have. Looks great- love the "hidden hook" feature so that it looks like funky wall art when there is nothing hanging.
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: Love this. Looks great
customer_reviews.text: Love this. Looks great. Screwed it into studs so it holds a ton of weight. Modern design looks good in our house. Each hook is far enough away to hold big winter coats. Gets a little crowded with 5 coats but can do 3 easily. Easy 5 if they are not big goose down coats.
customer_reviews.author: Travis Frayard

customer_reviews.title: Looks like wall art piece
customer_reviews.text: Just got this, haven't tried out its sturdiness too much but look wise its looks so nice on the wall its like art, definite space saver for a small hallway or entrance, beautiful color, easy to install , bought 2 and hung them together cheaper than buying one piece same sz just FYI , one measures almost 20 inches, each has 5 hooks
customer_reviews.author: Soldatny

customer_reviews.title: Small
customer_reviews.text: Its A LOT smaller than i imagined as i planned on using it as an entryway coat rack but thats my fault for not checking out the dimensions. The cost compared to how big it is is not worth it in my opinion. And its made out of plastic not wood. I have yet to put it up cause im not sure what purpose i want it for now. I wouldnt feel comfortable with putting more weight on than sweatshirts or towels. It is cute still so i may just put it up as accent on my wall.
customer_reviews.author: Brooke

customer_reviews.title: Fun style with great quality
customer_reviews.text: Hung this up behind the laundry door to hang wet spa towels. The towels are heavy but it holds them very well.
customer_reviews.author: jdprom

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love this! It stays flat and out of the way, and I get many compliments.
customer_reviews.author: friend

customer_reviews.title: Modern and sturdy!
customer_reviews.text: Lighter then I thought it would be. It’s more of a plastic material then a wood. But it doesn’t look like plastic. Great product, looks great and exactly what I wanted. Wish their was a larger size available also so I could get more of them
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Brush

customer_reviews.title: Great, simple hanger.
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my son's nursery to hang a couple of sweatshirts/hats on. Looks great and will grow with him.
customer_reviews.author: Erica L

customer_reviews.title: Fair for its price
customer_reviews.text: I like the design but it is not as solid as i had hopped. It is make of plastic which holds a good amount of jackets and hoodies but it is not as strong as wood.
customer_reviews.author: Dylan S.

customer_reviews.title: Super cool item
customer_reviews.text: Love having the utility of coat hooks that looks like a decor piece. Ingenious!!
customer_reviews.author: Ken Foree

customer_reviews.title: BEAUTIFUL design... hooks feel a little flimsy
customer_reviews.text: I honestly do love this rack, I even bought two to put them next to each other in my office... but if I have a heavy bag, I sit it below the racks on the floor as the hooks do not give me the confidence that it could handle it. They feel like 100% plastic, which is fine, because it is still an amazing addition to my office. I would buy again, but not if you plan on loading the things up with heavy items like book bags or something.
customer_reviews.author: JPRchitect

customer_reviews.title: Such a cute hook for the kids to learn to ...
customer_reviews.text: Such a cute hook for the kids to learn to hang their coats on. We have it in our mud room at a level that even my 2 yr old is able to hang up his own coat. He looks forward to it because he opens the hook to hang the coat and closes the hook when he takes the coat off the hook. Even something so minor is a game to him and helps me keep coats and sweatshirts off the floor.
customer_reviews.author: Lindenheart

customer_reviews.title: Very useful
customer_reviews.text: This matches my sons fortnite room! I love that the “hooks” can fold back up so that it’s not in the way of anything when not in use. Very practical and looks like art!
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay

customer_reviews.title: Interesting item
customer_reviews.text: Ordered by my son in law. He especially liked that it folded up when not in use.
customer_reviews.author: Ed Jones

customer_reviews.title: Cheap material, way too overpriced!
customer_reviews.text: No happy with the quality of this item. Feels and looks cheap. Very overpriced for what one gets.
customer_reviews.author: Kary

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Durabl. Sturdy. Easy to install and looks cool. 💯 recommendation 👍
customer_reviews.author: stevo

customer_reviews.title: Cute & trendy
customer_reviews.text: Highly recommend. I brought two bc having just one isn't that long. I use it to hang my purse and jackets. It's sturdy & looks trendy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install and looks great.
customer_reviews.text: Much cooler than the usual metal hooks. Happy with it. My only suggestion for manufacturer would be adding a template to mark the right spots to screw on the wall... it took me a while do it properly and leveled without a template.
customer_reviews.author: Thiago Nicoluci

customer_reviews.title: Love design and quality
customer_reviews.text: Installed 4 in our game room. White popped off the dark blue walls and matched our white trim and floor boards. Everyone's jackets, hats and umbrellas hang nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Christine S.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Looks like sculptural art when not in use. Haven't hung anything seriously heavy on it but I don't think I would hang anything heavier than 5 lbs on 1 hook.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Looks cool, not sure how durable
customer_reviews.text: A little tricky to hang, but love it! It's a coat rack in our entry and we've had several compliments from guests. Not sure the capacity of each hook. Seems like they could get maxed out.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany K

customer_reviews.title: No hardware for institution !
customer_reviews.text: This product does not come with any hardware to hang it up!! That’s ridiculous!!!
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl Orr

customer_reviews.title: looks great - works great
customer_reviews.text: Very cool modern look and highly functional. Love the fact that the hooks are blunt ends so no catching or stretching of fabric. great product!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful !!
customer_reviews.text: This looks like a piece of art hanging on the wall. It almost has no profile so it is great for a small living room.
customer_reviews.author: Danylle

customer_reviews.title: Looks good, included hardware is junk
customer_reviews.text: For the price, this thing is awesome. It looks great on the wall and holds anything we put on it. The hardware that came with it was really crappy and one of the screw heads broke off so I have to deduct one star for that, but if you use your own hardware (which we did after that) the rack itself is good. If any hook breakage occurs I'll update my review, but right now I love it.
customer_reviews.author: R. Soronen

customer_reviews.title: Sexy and simple.
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a coat rack for the back of my door for ages, but I could never settle on the right one because they just didn't have a flair to them or were too expensive. This looks perfect and blends in great with the color scheme of my room.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is so cool looking. I hung it up by my front ...
customer_reviews.text: This is so cool looking. I hung it up by my front door in my apartment and it looks like a piece of art is hanging in my place. I hang my hats and jackets from it and when I take my jacket off I push the hanger back in and it looks good. Hanging this up was very easy I have had this for over a year now and it is just as good as the day I got it. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the grandchildren
customer_reviews.text: We mounted the Umbra Sticks in our coat closet low enough for our young grandchildren to reach. They love finding the "hidden" sticks to hang their jackets, and "hiding" them again before they leave. We no longer have to remind them to put their jackets and coats away when they visit.
customer_reviews.author: Happy Grandma

customer_reviews.title: Unique
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to install. It is not the most sturdy. It does the trick for light weight coats. Not fit for heavy winter coats
customer_reviews.author: michelle

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love this! When the hooks are closed it looks like a pretty art piece. Super functional too.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect house warming gift!
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my friend who just moved into a new place. It adds accent to the house and is also functional!
customer_reviews.author: Uruviel

customer_reviews.title: Love this
customer_reviews.text: I've had this for 4 months now- I can hang my very heavy purse, some jackets and freinds purses with no issues. I would buy this agian if this one goes out. Love the way it adds a touch of art to the wall.
customer_reviews.author: MegaMon

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice, feels nice, cool AF
customer_reviews.text: Its easy to setup, the moving pegs have a really satisfying feeling when you pull them down and put them up...oh and it holds up hats, coats, robes, etc quite well.
customer_reviews.author: BW.

customer_reviews.title: Great space saving hooks
customer_reviews.text: From a distance, this appears very contemporary and classy. I purchased believing that it was made of something other than plastic. Initially, I was disappointed but once I got the thing on the wall, it looked nice. Sturdy enough to hold several light jackets and keys. I use the other one to hang metals from. It does come with a paper aid to mount the unit evenly on the wall.
customer_reviews.author: HeyCath

customer_reviews.title: Great coat rack
customer_reviews.text: Love this item. Super easy to install (you need a drill), very light weight. Durability seems fine, but I just put it up so let’s see how long it lasts.
customer_reviews.author: Aubrey English

customer_reviews.title: Eh
customer_reviews.text: Not a fan of the material because it's just painted mdf and the hooks are way too close to each other. Also to hang it, it has slot holes in the back for screws to go in. It doesn't feel as stable as having a screw going through the product then the wall.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Neat
customer_reviews.text: It is plastic like but for the price I'm not surprised. Love the look of it. Have keys, hats, and coats hanging on it. Regular circle key rings don't really fit but if you have something larger on your keys it will work.
customer_reviews.author: Farnsworth

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: The colors available are perfect for any decor. It is sturdy, easy to install. It is a sturdy plastic it can hold up jackets & purses I would not put on it a very heavy leather jacket. It is about 21” L and 6” W. I have it in my daughters room holding all her small handbags & it is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: MIRIAM

customer_reviews.title: Durable and nice looking!
customer_reviews.text: After going through two different coat racks in one year- both of which fell apart at random under the weight of our winter and fall coats- I decided I would give a wall rack a try. I am really glad I did! This piece is really unique looking and it comes with the kind of screws that assure it won't fall off the wall even if you put it into a wall with no stud. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Tanya Jane

customer_reviews.title: Modern look
customer_reviews.text: I love the look wish it wasnt plastic but it still looks great.
customer_reviews.author: Lia

customer_reviews.title: Looks/works great but found it hard to install
customer_reviews.text: Overall I love this. I've hung a heavy backpack on it and various purses with no problems. I had trouble with the installation though. No matter how carefully I measured, I could not get the slots on the rack to slide onto the screws. I finally had to disassemble the whole back, and reamed out the slots to make them bigger. I finally got it to work.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Stylish & Functional
customer_reviews.text: Love this product! I live on the east coast - so we have four seasons and frequent weather changes. Sometimes there are coats to be worn - sometimes not. I love that this piece looks unique when it is in use and like decor when it is not. The construction is solid and has held up to daily use of heavy winter coats. I plan on purchasing another as a house warming gift for a freind.
customer_reviews.author: Brea

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Love love love, looks great, it is made of plastic but I will say looks like wood. Well made. Happy customer.
customer_reviews.author: Jomdajo

customer_reviews.title: Suprisingly Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this wall rack for about a year and it's held up nicely. When I first received it I questioned it's integrity (it's made of some sort of plastic). But after about a year of use it has proved me wrong. It's currently hanging on my wall with about 30 lbs of jackets and hats and it's still 100% functional and intact.
customer_reviews.author: Richy C

customer_reviews.title: Super Look
customer_reviews.text: I received my Umbra Sticks yesterday and hung it this morning. I've got 4 purses and my bathrobe hanging from them and I don't forsee any problem. I agree with others who state the product is not wood, but certainly it seems sturdy enough for my needs. Granted, I won't be hanging heavy coats from them since I live in Miami, but for the price,convenience and the look I'm very pleased. I may order another because of the unique look or check out other products from this line.
customer_reviews.author: Boomer

customer_reviews.title: Sleek
customer_reviews.text: This is great, we use it in our foyer for our 2 and 5 year old.
customer_reviews.author: MBW

customer_reviews.title: Color was a beige color, not white
customer_reviews.text: The product was as described minus the color. I expected it to be white but it was a beige color. The material seems kind of cheap but the design is cute and modern.
customer_reviews.author: Diana Yoon

customer_reviews.title: Modern and fun but poor quality
customer_reviews.text: You can see the poor construction quality along the edge of each flip down stick. The sides of the sticks look like they are glued on and the edges are poorly aligned. Overall though, you don't see this often (either the sticks are flipped up or they are covered with a garment) and the coat rack works well and can hold heavy coats, bike helmets, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Caitlin D

product_meta.title: Umbra Sticks Multi Rack – Modern, Unique, Space-Saving Hanger with 5 Flip-Down Hooks for Hanging Coats, Scarfs, Purses and More, Black
product_meta.description: Color:BlackKeeping entryways with all those coats and accessories neat and organized is always a challenge, especially in small spaces. Transform this area into a tidy and stylish space with a modern coat rack that doubles as wall art. Introducing Sticks Multi Hook by UmbraSticks Multi Wall Hook is a sculptural and yet functional wall mountable coat rack that will provide you with ample hanging space in virtually every area of your home, office or dorm room. This versatile and decorative coat hanger accommodates all your personal hanging needs for items such as coats, scarves, purses, umbrellas, bathrobes, towels, accessories or even light weighted cleaning tools like brooms, sweepers creating a clean, seamless profile that’s great for small spaces. Designed to support even heavier items, each flip-hook will hold up to 5 lbs. , making it an ideal solution for home organization. Sticks Wall Mounted Coat Rack measures 19 1/2 x 7 1/4 x 1-inch and comes complete with mounting hardware making installation quick and easy. Start organizing and decorating your home with this eye-catching modern design by ordering Sticks Multi Hook from Umbra today. About Umbra: A global product design company providing original, modern, casual, and functional design for the home.
feature_bullets: MODERN & FUNCTIONAL: Sticks Multi Hook Coat Rack is a unique wall mountable coat rack, hat rack, and clothing rack that provides 5 flip-down coat hooks and ample hanging space for your entryway, bedroom, office or dorm room.

UNIQUE & STRONG: Made of molded polypropylene, the sculptural design of Sticks Multi Hook garment rack looks at first glance like a modern piece of art, until you notice that some of the “sticks” flip down to become hooks for hanging (each supporting up to 5 lbs. )

EASY TO SET UP & USE: Sticks coat hooks measures 19 ½ x 7 ¼ x 1 inches and come complete with easy to follow instructions and all the necessary hardware to quickly mount it on to virtually any wall in your home, office, or dorm room
5-YEAR MANUFACTURER : Shop with confidence knowing that all Umbra products are backed by a 5-Year Manufacturer

VERSATILE & DECORATIVE: Sticks Multi Hook helps keep your home organized while simultaneously adding a modern decorative touch. Use Sticks to hang your daily essentials like coats, hats, scarves, purses, umbrellas, bathrobes and more

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
